segments.text: Would you like me to help you on your new project ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would love the help ! Would you prefer helping with the writing part or is programming more your thing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would enjoy helping with the writing portion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect ! You'll be working alone on that portion . Do you like to work alone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our first meeting is next Monday . Could you meet with us at that time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please send me your background information before the meeting so I can look at it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can send that information to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I look forward to working with you . Enjoy your week !
segments.speaker: S2
